Package com.bookapp.exceptions

package com.bookapp.exceptions
Provides custom exception classes used in the BookApp application.

This package contains exceptions that are specifically tailored for handling various error scenarios related to book management. Each exception extends the Exception class and provides more specific error handling for conditions such as when an author, category, ID, price, or title is not found.

The following exceptions are included in this package:

  • AuthorNotFoundException - Thrown when an author is not found in the system.
  • CategoryNotFoundException - Thrown when a category is not found in the system.
  • IdNotFoundException - Thrown when an ID is not found in the system.
  • PriceNotAvailableException - Thrown when the price of an item is not available.
  • TitleNotFoundException - Thrown when a book title is not found in the system.

Each exception class includes:

  • A default constructor that initializes the exception without a specific message.
  • A parameterized constructor that allows for specifying a detail message to describe the error.
Author:
MonigaBalasubramanian

    PriceNotAvailableException
    Custom exception thrown when the price of an item (e.g., a book) is not available.
    TitleNotFoundException
    Custom exception thrown when a book title is not found in the system.
